nodes.text: Thispy was a male Human who lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. He made his living as a merchant on board Carrick Station.

Thispy first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, as a Nar Shaddaa planetary commendation vendor on board Carrick Station. He was later relabeled as the Level 21 Equipment Vendor, though he was later removed along with the rest of the planetary Equipment Vendors in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015.
